title: Fireside with the Underboss - "I Hope You Don't Love Me Like You Love Your Wife"
description: At this point, Sammy has officially left the Colombos and becomes a member of the Gambino family. He learns that the Gambino's do things a bit differently and learns a lesson on respect from Carlo Gambino himself.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: At this point, Sammy has officially left the Colombos and becomes a member of the Gambino family. He learns that the Gambino's do things a bit differently and learns a lesson on respect from Carlo Gambino himself.
